prompts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt?

messages.backupDescription: Data backed up to application directory
messages.backupNotSupported: Automatic backup not supported on this platform, please use export
messages.restoreDescription: Restored to selected version, please save to apply changes

welcome.title: Welcome to iPrompt
welcome.subtitle: Professional Prompt Management System
welcome.description: iPrompt is a tool designed specifically for managing and organizing AI Prompts, helping you efficiently create, edit, categorize, and search your prompts.

features.title: Key Features
features.organizeDesc: Easily organize your prompts using categories and tags
features.searchDesc: Quick search and filter to find the prompt you need instantly
features.versionDesc: Automatically save revision history, rollback and restore anytime
features.exportDesc: Support data import/export for easy backup and migration

codeReview.title: Code Review Assistant
codeReview.content:
As a senior developer, please review the following code. Focus on:
1. Code quality and readability
2. Potential bugs and security issues
3. Performance optimization suggestions
4. Best practice recommendations

Code:
[Paste code here]

translator.title: Chinese-English Translation Expert
translator.content:
As a professional Chinese-English translator, I will provide content in Chinese or English. Please:
1. Translate accurately
2. Maintain the tone and style of the original
3. Provide multiple translation options for technical terms
4. Provide cultural context when necessary

Content to translate:
[Enter content here]

weeklyReport.title: Weekly Report Generator
weeklyReport.content:
Based on the work content I provide, help me generate a professional weekly report. Format requirements:
1. Work completed this week (sorted by importance)
2. Problems encountered and solutions
3. Next week's work plan
4. Support or resources needed

This week's work:
[List this week's work here]
